posts.title: 2020å¯’å‡é›†è®­å››(GCD)--NEFU
posts.text:
ä½ è®¤çœŸçš„è¯´ä½ å–œæ¬¢ç™½å±±èŒ¶â€ å¯’å‡æ¥å­¦ä¹ æ•°è®º,åœ¨å¾ˆå¤šåœ°æ–¹éƒ½å‡ºç°äº† è¾—è½¬ç›¸é™¤æ³•1234int gcd(int a,int b){ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;} 1.æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°å’Œæœ€å°å…¬å€æ•°123456789101112131415#include<stdio.h>int gcd(int a,int b) //è¾—è½¬ç›¸é™¤æ³•{ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;}int main(){ int a,b; while(~scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)) { printf("%d %d
",gcd(a,b),a*b/gcd(a,b)); } return 0;} 2. åˆè§GCD123456789101112131415161718192021#include<stdio.h>int gcd(int a,int b){ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;}int main(){ int a,b,c; while(~scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)) { c=2*b; //å› ä¸ºbæ˜¯è¾ƒå°æ•°,æ‰€ä»¥cæœ€å°ä¸º2*bç„¶åå‘ä¸Šä¾æ¬¡åŠ b while(c){ if(gcd(a,c)==b) break; c+=b; //cçš„æ­¥é•¿ } printf("%d
",c); } return 0;} 3.å¤šä¸ªæ•°çš„æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°12345678910111213141516171819#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;ll gcd(ll a,ll b){ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;}int main(){ ll a[11],n; while(~scanf("%lld",&n)) { for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) scanf("%lld",&a[i]); for(int i=1;i<=n-1;i++) a[i+1]=gcd(a[i],a[i+1]); //æ­¤å¾ªç¯ä¸­å°†å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°çš„æœ€å°å…±çº¦æ•°ç»™åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å‘ä¸Šæ¨ printf("%lld
",a[n]); } return 0;} 4.å¤šä¸ªæ•°çš„æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•°12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;ll a[51]={0};ll gcd(ll a,ll b){ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;}ll lcm(ll a,ll b){ return (a/gcd(a,b))*b;}ll solve(ll a[],ll n){ ll ans; ans=lcm(a[0],a[1]); for(int i=2;i<n;i++) ans=lcm(ans,a[i]); return ans;}int main(){ int n; while(~scanf("%d",&n)) { for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%lld",&a[i]); ll ans=solve(a,n); printf("%lld
",ans); } return 0;} 5.LCM&GCD123456#include<stdio.h>int main(){ } 6.äººè§äººçˆ±gcd1234567891011121314151617181920#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;ll gcd(ll a,ll b){ return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;}int main(){ ll t,a,b; while(~scanf("%lld",&t)&&t) { while(t--){ scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b); ll ans=gcd(a,b); printf("%lld
",a*a-2*ans*b); //a*a=x^2+y*2+2*x*y|2*ans*b=2*x*y } } return 0;} 8.å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚å–æ¨¡123456789101112131415161718192021222324#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;ll mode(ll g,ll n,ll mod){ ll ans=1; while(n) { if(n&1) ans=ans*g%mod; g=g*g%mod; n>>=1; } return ans;}int main(){ ll a,b,c; while(~scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c)) { printf("%lld
",mode(a,b,c)); } return 0;} 9.åº“ç‰¹çš„æ•°å­¦é¢˜1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;const ll mod=1e9+7;ll mode(ll a,ll b){ ll ans=1; while(b){ if(b%2){ ans=ans*a%mod; b--; } b/=2; a=a*a%mod; } return ans;}int main(){ ll n,m; while(~scanf("%lld",&n)) { m=mode(3,n); m*=2; m%=mod; printf("%lld
",m); } return 0;} æ„Ÿè°¢NEFUOJ

posts.text: ä½ ç†„ç­äº†çƒŸè¯´èµ·ä»å‰ğŸ‘‹ åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ç†è§£ 1.ä¸‰è§’å½¢æœ€å¤§å’Œ(è¯¾ä»¶æœ€åä¸€ç§å†™æ³•å°†äºŒç»´è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºä¸€ç»´)1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526#include<stdio.h>#define MAX 101int max(int a,int b){ return a>b?a:b;}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int dp[MAX][MAX]={0}; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=i;j++){ scanf("%d",&dp[i][j]); } } int *maxSum; maxSum=dp[n]; for(int i=n-1;i>=1;i--){ for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){ maxSum[j]=max(maxSum[j],maxSum[j+1])+dp[i][j]; } } printf("%d\n",maxSum[1]); return 0;} 2.æœ€é•¿ä¸Šå‡å­åºåˆ—12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728#include<stdio.h>int a[1010];int maxlen[1010];int max(int a,int b){ return a>b?a:b;}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ scanf("%d",&a[i]); maxlen[i]=1; //æ¯ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µé»˜è®¤åŠ ä¸Šæœ¬èº«çš„æƒ…å†µ } for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){ for(int j=1;j<i;j++){ if(a[i]>a[j]) maxlen[i]=max(maxlen[i],maxlen[j]+1); //å¦‚æœæ¡ä»¶æˆç«‹å°±æ˜¯jçš„æƒ…å†µ+1 } } int maxn=-1; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) if(maxlen[i]>maxn) maxn=maxlen[i]; printf("%d\n",maxn); return 0;}

posts.title: Cè¯­è¨€å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°
åœ£è¯èŠ‚æœˆèµ›
ä¸œåŒ—æ—ä¸šå¤§å­¦ç¬¬15å±Šæ ¡èµ›ï¼ˆå¤§ä¸€ç»„ï¼‰èµ›åé¢˜è§£ä¸æ€è€ƒ
posts.text:
æ¯”èµ›é“¾æ¥ä¸œåŒ—æ—ä¸šå¤§å­¦ç¬¬15å±Šæ ¡èµ›ï¼ˆå¤§ä¸€ç»„ï¼‰ A.ä¸‰è§’å½¢é¢ç§¯(easy)123456789101112#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h>#include<math.h>int main(){ double a,b,c,p; scanf("%lf%lf%lf",&a,&b,&c); p=0.5*(a+b+c); printf("%.1lf
",sqrt(p*(p-a)*(p-b)*(p-c))); return 0;} B.æœ€å¤§è´¨å› å­(medium)123456789101112131415161718192021222324#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h>int getprime(int n){ int i=2; int res=1; while(n>2) { if(n%i==0) { n/=i; res=i; } else i++; } return res;}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); printf("%d
",getprime(n)); return 0;} C.æ¨è¾‰ä¸‰è§’(easy&äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„åšæ³•)1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include<stdio.h>int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int a[31][31]; memset(a,0,sizeof(a)); a[1][1]=1,a[2][1]=1,a[2][2]=1; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) { if(j==1) a[i][j]=1; if(i>2&&j>1) a[i][j]=a[i-1][j]+a[i-1][j-1]; printf("%d ",a[i][j]); } printf("
"); } return 0;} D.â€nefuâ€çš„æ•°ç›®(medium)è¿™é¢˜ä¸€å¼€å§‹æ²¡æœ‰çœ‹æ‡‚é¢˜ç›®,å…¶å®åªéœ€è¦ç”¨æš´åŠ›æšä¸¾n-e-f-uä¸ªæ•°çš„æ–¹æ³•å°±è¡Œäº†,å¥½è ¢Â·Â·Â· 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h>int main(){ int count=0; char a[55]; gets(a); int len=strlen(a); //å¼€å§‹æšä¸¾ for(int i=0;i<len;i++) { if(a[i]=='n') { for(int j=i+1;j<len;j++) if(a[j]=='e') { for(int k=j+1;k<len;k++) if(a[k]=='f') { for(int q=k+1;q<len;q++) if(a[q]=='u') count++;//è®¡æ•° } } } } printf("%d
",count);} E.æœ€å°ä¿®æ”¹æ¬¡æ•°(difficult)æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ç®—æ³•å®ç° 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h>int min(int a,int b){ return a<b?a:b;}int main(){ int count=0; char a[1003],b[1003]; gets(a); gets(b); int l1=strlen(a); int l2=strlen(b); if(l1==l2) { for(int i=0;i<l1;i++) if(a[i]!=b[i]) count++; } else { count=10000; for(int i=0;i<=l1-l2;i++) { int k=0; for(int j=0;j<l2;j++) //æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ç®—æ³•å®ç°ä¸»ä½“ { if(a[j+i]!=b[j]) k++; } count=min(k,count); } } printf("%d
",count); return 0;} F.å­—å…¸åº(medium)ä¸»è¦æ˜¯éš¾æƒ³åˆ°8è¿›åˆ¶å­—å…¸åºçš„æ¯”è¾ƒæ–¹æ³•(æŒ‰ç…§å…«è¿›åˆ¶æœ€å¤§æ•°æ¥æ¯”è¾ƒ) 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233#include<stdio.h>int main(){ int n,a; scanf("%d",&n); if(n/32767) printf("77777
"); else { if(n/32760) {a=7777*10+n%32760;printf("%d
",a);} else if(n/4095) printf("7777
"); else { if(n/4088) {a=777*10+n%4088;printf("%d
",a);} else if(n/511) printf("777
"); else { if(n/504) {a=77*10+n%504;printf("%d
",a);} else if(n/63) printf("77
"); else { if(n/56) {a=7*10+n%56;printf("%d
",a);} else if(n/7) printf("7
"); else { printf("%d
",n); } } } } } return 0;} G.æœ€å°å·®å€¼(æ°´é¢˜)ä¸€å¼€å§‹ç»™è¿™ä¸ªå›¾æè’™äº†,ä»¥ä¸ºæ˜¯é“éš¾é¢˜,è¿™é¢˜å’Œæ–°é£æ¯2020çº§çš„æ±‚å¹³è¡¡ä½ç½®é‚£é¢˜ä¸€æ · 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include<stdio.h>#include<math.h>typedef long long ll;ll a[200001];ll min(ll a,ll b){ return a<b?a:b;}int main(){ ll n,sum1=0,sum2=0; scanf("%lld",&n); for(ll i=0;i<n;i++) { scanf("%lld",a+i); sum2+=a[i]; } ll k,minn=1e9; for(ll i=0;i<n;i++) { k=abs(sum2-sum1); minn=min(k,minn); sum1+=a[i]; sum2-=a[i]; } printf("%lld
",minn); return 0;} H.æŸ“è‰²æ–¹æ¡ˆ(difficult)è¿™é¢˜æˆ‘æ²¡æƒ³å‡ºæ¥,æ‰€ä»¥å°±æ˜¯difficult,è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰æƒ³å‡ºæ¥,ç­‰å­¦ä¼šæ·±åº¦æœç´¢å†å›æ¥çœ‹çœ‹ I.æœ€å¤§æ­£æ–¹å½¢(difficult)1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738#include<stdio.h>void sort(int *a,int n){ int t; for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++) if(a[i]>a[j]) { t=a[i]; a[i]=a[j]; a[j]=t; }}int main(){ int n,k; scanf("%d",&n); int a[n]; for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { k=0; for(int j=n-1;j>=0;j--) { if(a[j]>=i) k++; } if(k>=i) continue; else { k=i-1; break; } } printf("%d
",k); return 0;} J.æœ€å¤§å€¼(medium)è¿™é¢˜æˆ‘ä¸€ç›´è§‰å¾—æˆ‘çš„åšæ³•æ²¡é”™ä½†å°±æ˜¯WA,å…¶å®æ˜¯è‡ªå·±è ¢äº†æ²¡æœ‰æƒ³åˆ°å‡ ä¸ªå€¼ç›¸ç­‰ä¸”éƒ½æ˜¯æœ€å¤§å€¼çš„æƒ…å†µğŸ¤¡ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950#include<stdio.h>int a[200006];int max(int a,int b){ return a>b?a:b;}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int maxxx=0; for(int i=0;i<n;i++) { scanf("%d",a+i); maxxx=max(maxxx,a[i]); } int p=0,k; for(int i=0;i<n;i++) { if(maxxx==a[i]) { p++; k=i; } } if(p==1) { int maxxxx=0; for(int i=0;i<n;i++) { if(i==k) continue; maxxxx=max(maxxxx,a[i]); } for(int i=0;i<n;i++) { if(i==k) { printf("%d
",maxxxx); continue; } printf("%d
",maxxx); } } else { for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d
",maxxx); } return 0;} K.å¾ªç¯æ’åˆ—(difficult)123456#include<stdio.h>int main(){} L.åº“ç‰¹ä¸å›´æ£‹(difficult)12345678910111213141516#include<stdio.h>#include<math.h>typedef long long ll;int main(){ ll n; scanf("%lld",&n); ll a=sqrt(n); ll ans=4*a; ll b=n-a*a; if(b==0) printf("%lld
",ans); else if(b>0&&b<=a) printf("%lld
",ans+2); else if(b>a) printf("%lld
",ans+4); return 0;} Thanks for NEFUOJ

posts.title: ç®€ä¾¿æ–¹æ³•åˆé›†
posts.text:
æœ‰å…³å› æ•°ä¸å› å­é—®é¢˜å¯å‚è€ƒ[æ­¤åšå®¢] 1.å¿«é€Ÿæ±‚å› å­ä¸ªæ•°12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;ll dcp(ll n){ ll i,ans=1; for(i=2;i*i<n;i++) { if(n%i==0) { ll temp=0; while(n%i==0) { n/=i; temp++; } ans*=(temp+1); } } if(n>1) ans*=2; return ans;}int main(){ ll x; scanf("%lld",&x); /* ll count=0; while(x!=2) { x=dcp(x); count++; } printf("%lld
",count); æ±‚è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•° */ printf("%lld
",dcp(x)); return 0;} 2.å¿«é€Ÿæ±‚å› æ•°å’Œ1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include<stdio.h>int sum(int n){ int s=1; for(int i=0;i*i<=n;i++) { if(n%i==0) { int a=1; while(n%i==0) { n/=i; a*=i; } s=s*(a*i-1)/(i-1); } } if(n>1) s=s*(n+1); return s;}int main(){ int x; scanf("%d",&x); printf("%d
",sum(x)); return 0;}

posts.text: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324#include<stdio.h>int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int x=1,y=0,cnt=0; int a[101][101]; memset(a,0,sizeof(a)); while(cnt<n*n) //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç”»ç¬”-ä¸Šä¸‹å·¦å³ { while(y+1<=n&&!a[x][y+1]) a[x][++y]=++cnt; //å³ while(x+1<=n&&!a[x+1][y]) a[++x][y]=++cnt; //ä¸‹ while(y-1>=1&&!a[x][y-1]) a[x][--y]=++cnt; //å·¦ while(x-1>=1&&!a[x-1][y]) a[--x][y]=++cnt; //ä¸Š } for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { for(int j=1;j<=n;j++) printf("%d ",a[i][j]); printf("\n"); } return 0;}

posts.title: ç¼–å†™å¤´æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œçš„powerå‡½æ•°,å¹¶ä¼˜åŒ–(å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚)
posts.text: #include<math.h>å¤´æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæœ‰powerå‡½æ•°ä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½æ²¡æœ‰å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚å¿«ï¼Œè‡³äºä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦å®šä¹‰mod=1e9+7ç„¶åå–ä½™æˆ‘ä¹Ÿæ²¡å¤ªæ¸…æ¥šï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Ÿ 1.æœ€å¼€å§‹å­¦Cçš„æ—¶å€™å†™çš„å¹³æ–¹æ±‚æ³•(æ•°æ®å°çš„æ—¶å€™å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œ,æ•°æ®å¤§äº†æ—¶é—´ä¼šè¶…æ—¶)1234567891011#include<stdio.h>int main(){ int a,b,sum=1; scanf("%d%d",&a,&b); for(int i=1;i<=b;i++) sum*=a; printf("%d\n",sum); return 0;} 2.å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚(power)1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include<stdio.h>typedef long long ll;const ll mod=1e9+7;ll power(ll g,ll n){ ll ans=1; while(n) //næ˜¯gçš„æ¬¡æ–¹æ•° { if(n&1) ans=ans*g%mod; g=g*g%mod; n>>=1; //è¿ç”¨ä½è¿ç®—å°†nç¼©å°ä¸¤å€ } return ans;}int main(){ ll n,g; scanf("%lld%lld",&g,&n); printf("%lld\n",power(g,n)); return 0;}

posts.text: Flagï¼š15å¤©å­¦å®Œæ±‡ç¼–ï¼ï¼ğŸ¤¡ 1.æ€»çº¿è¯´æ˜123456781ï¼‰åœ°å€æ€»çº¿ #è‹¥åœ°å€æ€»çº¿æœ‰Næ ¹åœ°å€æ€»çº¿ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¯´åœ°å€æ€»çº¿å®½åº¦ç‚œNå°±å¯ä»¥å¯»æ‰¾2^Nçš„å†…å­˜å•å…ƒ2ï¼‰æ•°æ®æ€»çº¿ #è¿›è¡ŒCPUä¸å†…å­˜æˆ–å…¶ä»–å™¨ä»¶ä¹‹é—´æ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“ï¼Œå®ƒçš„å®½åº¦å†³å®šäº†æ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“çš„é€Ÿåº¦3ï¼‰æ§åˆ¶æ€»çº¿ #æ§åˆ¶æ€»çº¿å¤šå°‘å†³å®šæ§åˆ¶çš„æ•°é‡æ³¨ï¼š1ï¼‰æ±‡ç¼–æŒ‡ä»¤æ˜¯æœºå™¨æŒ‡ä»¤çš„åŠ©è®°ç¬¦ï¼ŒåŒæœºå™¨æŒ‡ä»¤ä¸€ä¸€å¯¹åº”2ï¼‰æ¯ä¸€ç§CPUéƒ½æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„æ±‡ç¼–æŒ‡ä»¤é›†3ï¼‰CPUå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä¿¡æ¯åœ¨å­˜å‚¨å™¨ä¸­å­˜æ”¾4ï¼‰åœ¨å­˜å‚¨å™¨ä¸­æŒ‡ä»¤å’Œæ•°æ®æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•åŒºåˆ«ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶ä¿¡æ¯ æ³¨ï¼š1Byte=8bit,1Kb=1024B,1Mb=1024Kb,1Gb=1024Kb,1Tb=1024Gb; ç®€å•åå…­è¿›åˆ¶åŠ æ³•0123h+0456h12345678910111213assume cs:codesg //ä¼ªæŒ‡ä»¤codesg segmentmov ax,0123hmov bx,0456hadd ax,bx //ç°åœ¨è¿˜åªèƒ½å†™å‡ºåå…­è¿›åˆ¶çš„åŠ æ³•add ax,axmov ax,4c00hint 21hcodesg endsend

posts.text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122#include<stdio.h>#include<string.h> //å¼•å…¥åº“å‡½æ•°void invstr(char *s) //å®šä¹‰å€’åºå­˜æ”¾çš„å‡½æ•°{ char *p,t; int i,len=strlen(s); for(i=0,p=s;i<len/2;i++) { t=*(p+i); *(p+i)=*(p+len-i-1); //å°†æ•°ç»„çš„å‰ä¸€åŠä¸åä¸€åŠå¯¹æ¢ *(p+len-i-1)=t; }}int main(){ char a[10000]; gets(a); invstr(a); printf("%s",a); //è¾“å‡ºå€’åºåçš„æ•°ç»„ return 0;} è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘ç”¨æŒ‡é’ˆå†™çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°,Keep Fighting.

posts.text: 1.ç±»å‹ å­—ç¬¦å‹ æ•´æ•°å‹ æµ®ç‚¹æ•°å‹ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‹ å¸ƒå°”å‹ æ³¨ï¼šPythonæ³¨é‡ç¼©è¿›

posts.title: æ’åºç®—æ³•åˆé›†
posts.excerpt: 1.å†’æ³¡æ’åº(BubbleSort)1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; temp=*a; *a=*b; //ç¼–å†™äº¤æ¢å€¼å‡½æ•°swap *b=temp;}void BubbleSort(int a[],int n){ for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) //å†’æ³¡æ’åºä¸»é¢˜ for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++) if(a[i]>a[j]) swap(&a[i],&a[j]);}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int a[n]; BubbleSort(a,n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;}
posts.text: 1.å†’æ³¡æ’åº(BubbleSort)1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; temp=*a; *a=*b; //ç¼–å†™äº¤æ¢å€¼å‡½æ•°swap *b=temp;}void BubbleSort(int a[],int n){ for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) //å†’æ³¡æ’åºä¸»é¢˜ for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++) if(a[i]>a[j]) swap(&a[i],&a[j]);}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); int a[n]; BubbleSort(a,n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;} 2.é€‰æ‹©æ’åº(SelectSort)123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233#include<stdio.h>void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; temp=*a; *a=*b; //ç¼–å†™äº¤æ¢å€¼å‡½æ•°swap *b=temp;}void SelectSort(int a[],int n){ for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) { int minIndex=i; for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++) { if(a[j]<a[minIndex]) minIndex=j; } swap(&a[i],&a[minIndex]); }}int main(){ int a[10000],n; scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); SelectSort(a,n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;} 3.æ’å…¥æ’åº(InsertSort)12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include<stdio.h>void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; //å®šä¹‰ä¸­é—´å˜é‡ temp=*a; *a=*b; *b=temp;}void InsertSort(int a[],int n){ int i,j,temp; for(i=1;i<n;i++) { temp=a[i]; for(j=i-1;j>=0&&a[j]>temp;j--) //å¦‚æœæ¡ä»¶æˆç«‹å°±å°†æ•°ç»„å‰ç§» a[j+1]=a[j]; a[j+1]=temp; //æ¡ä»¶ä¸æˆç«‹orå¾ªç¯ç»“æŸå°†tempå€¼æ”¾åœ¨j+1å¤„ }}int main(){ int a[10000],n; scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); InsertSort(a,n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;} 4.å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº(QuickSort)1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738#include<stdio.h>void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; //å®šä¹‰ä¸­é—´å˜é‡ temp=*a; *a=*b; *b=temp;}void QuickSort(int a[],int left,int right){ if(left>=right) return; int k=a[left]; //æ’åºä»å·¦è¾¹å¼€å§‹æ¯”è¾ƒ int i=left,j=right; while(i!=j) { while(j>i&&a[j]>=k) j--; swap(&a[i],&a[j]); while(i<j&&a[i]<=k) i++; swap(&a[i],&a[j]); } QuickSort(a,left,i-1); QuickSort(a,i+1,right);}int main(){ int a[10000],n; scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); QuickSort(a,0,n-1); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;} 5.å½’å¹¶æ’åº(MergeSort)12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546#include<stdio.h>int a[10000],b[10000];void swap(int *a,int *b){ int temp; temp=*a; *a=*b; *b=temp;}void Merge(int a[],int left,int mid,int right,int tmp[]){ int pb=0,p1=left,p2=mid+1; while(p1<=mid&&p2<=right) { if(a[p1]<a[p2]) tmp[pb++]=a[p1++]; //å½’å¹¶æ’åºçš„ä¸»ä½“éƒ¨åˆ†,å°†äºŒåˆ†éƒ¨åˆ†è¿›è¡Œæ’åº else tmp[pb++]=a[p2++]; } while(p1<=mid) tmp[pb++]=a[p1++]; while(p2<=right) tmp[pb++]=a[p2++]; for(int i=0;i<right-left+1;i++) a[left+i]=tmp[i]; //aæ•°ç»„ä¸‹æ ‡ä»left+iå¼€å§‹}void MergeSort(int a[],int left,int right,int tmp[]){ if(right>left) //äºŒåˆ†æ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œæ’åº { int mid=left+(right-left)/2; MergeSort(a,left,mid,tmp); MergeSort(a,mid+1,right,tmp); Merge(a,left,mid,right,tmp); }}int main(){ int n; scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",a+i); MergeSort(a,0,n-1,b); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]); return 0;}
